Name: Cowboy Girl
About the game: In the Wild West, very terrible and foreign monsters have been found up with which you, as the young Cowboy Girl, who recently bought her first revolver, has to fight with them! Cowboy Girl - is a game about a young cowboy girl who will must to fight with differents monsters with the help of special bullets. Pay attention to the obstacles you will encounter in order to not remain in the Wild West forever!!! Game Features: - 10 different levels with different monsters - 5 steam achievements - As you pass the levels, they will become more an more difficult
